videos.name: Message in a Bottle
videos.overview: Bosch and Chandler’s pursuit of Carl Rogers unexpectedly intersects with Russian organized crime. A chilling crime scene in Thai Town forces Maddie to face the limits of her job.
videos.description: Bosch and Chandler’s pursuit of Carl Rogers unexpectedly intersects with Russian organized crime. A chilling crime scene in Thai Town forces Maddie to face the limits of her job.

videos.name: Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
videos.overview: As Bosch digs deeper into Whitney Vance’s past, other powerful forces at play monitor his every move. Chandler defends a man in a case of wrongful arrest. Carl Rogers finds himself is forced to hatch a new scheme. Maddie wrestles with the emotional toll of her job.
videos.description: As Bosch digs deeper into Whitney Vance’s past, other powerful forces at play monitor his every move. Chandler defends a man in a case of wrongful arrest. Carl Rogers finds himself is forced to hatch a new scheme. Maddie wrestles with the emotional toll of her job.

videos.name: Plan B
videos.overview: The Whitney Vance story takes a surprise turn, complicating Bosch's investigation. Bosch and Chandler plot to turn the tables on Rogers. Maddie struggles with taking her job home with her.
videos.description: The Whitney Vance story takes a surprise turn, complicating Bosch's investigation. Bosch and Chandler plot to turn the tables on Rogers. Maddie struggles with taking her job home with her.

videos.name: Chain of Authenticity
videos.overview: Will Carl Rogers outmanoeuvre Bosch and Chandler and escape justice once again? Maddie Bosch faces every cop's biggest fear.
videos.description: Will Carl Rogers outmanoeuvre Bosch and Chandler and escape justice once again? Maddie Bosch faces every cop's biggest fear.

videos.name: One of Your Own
videos.overview: Bosch takes up a murder case once thought solved by the LAPD. Maddie’s pulled into the department’s pursuit of a cop shooter. Chandler wrestles with the fallout of Carl Rogers.
videos.description: Bosch takes up a murder case once thought solved by the LAPD. Maddie’s pulled into the department’s pursuit of a cop shooter. Chandler wrestles with the fallout of Carl Rogers.

videos.name: Bloodline
videos.overview: As the Vance case enters a new phase, Bosch faces an escalating threat. A controversial police shooting ensnares both Maddie and Chandler.
videos.description: As the Vance case enters a new phase, Bosch faces an escalating threat. A controversial police shooting ensnares both Maddie and Chandler.

videos.name: Cat Got a Name?
videos.overview: The truth behind Whitney Vance’s death finally comes to light. Maddie helps with a major break in the Screen Cutter case. Chandler builds her best case against the LAPD.
videos.description: The truth behind Whitney Vance’s death finally comes to light. Maddie helps with a major break in the Screen Cutter case. Chandler builds her best case against the LAPD.

videos.name: Always/All Ways
videos.overview: Bosch reaches a dangerous end game in the Vance case. Chandler courts an unlikely ally in her wrongful death suit. Maddie pays the cost of getting too involved with her work.
videos.description: Bosch reaches a dangerous end game in the Vance case. Chandler courts an unlikely ally in her wrongful death suit. Maddie pays the cost of getting too involved with her work.

videos.name: The Lady Vanishes
videos.overview: Maddie’s gone missing, and it’s all hands on deck to find her. Bosch allies with Chandler, Mo, and an old friend in a race against the clock to save his daughter’s life.
videos.description: Maddie’s gone missing, and it’s all hands on deck to find her. Bosch allies with Chandler, Mo, and an old friend in a race against the clock to save his daughter’s life.

videos.name: Zzyzx
videos.overview: The Screen Cutter attempts to bargain with Bosch and Chandler, who go to extremes to locate Maddie before it’s too late.
videos.description: The Screen Cutter attempts to bargain with Bosch and Chandler, who go to extremes to locate Maddie before it’s too late.

videos.name: Inside Man
videos.overview: Chandler enlists Bosch to defend a man accused of a brutal crime. Back on the job, Maddie struggles to find her footing. The FBI sets its sights on Bosch and Chandler.
videos.description: Chandler enlists Bosch to defend a man accused of a brutal crime. Back on the job, Maddie struggles to find her footing. The FBI sets its sights on Bosch and Chandler.

videos.name: Musso & Frank
videos.overview: Bosch digs into the Lexi Parks murder. Chandler’s new case attracts all the wrong attention. Maddie accepts an exciting assignment that partners her once again with Reina Vasquez.

videos.description: Given the mountains of evidence against them, Dory, Drew, and their uninspiring legal team struggle to come up with a half-decent defense strategy, while Portia and Elliott are aggressively interrogated under fluorescent lighting.

description: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.
name: From Paris with Love

description: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.
name: Mud
The Amateur
description: When his supervisors at the CIA refuse to take action after his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a decoder takes matters into his own hands.
Virgil Oldman, a wealthy art auctioneer, takes the help of a young artificer, Robert, to understand and woo Claire Ibbetson, a young heiress, who hires him to auction off an antique collection.

description: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

description: In the underworld of debt-collecting, homegrown hustler Peg Dahl will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.
name: Buffaloed
Three Thousand Years of Longing
description: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

description: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.
